title: Key Regression Stats & Mid-Round Draft Targets
description:
Field Yates and Mike Clay run through some of Mike’s key projections for the season including what players are set for a regression that should impact their draft position. Then, Liz Loza joins the show to talk some players you need to be targeting in the middle rounds of your drafts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: How Much Will A Regression In Performance Impact Draft Position For Some Players?
